name: BITCOIN Act
description: The Bitcoin Act will allow the US govt to buy 1m #Bitcoin over 5 years. Max-Bidding! $BTCACT Let’s put America on sound financial footing and pass the Bitcoin Act. We can pass the Bitcoin Act in the first 100 days of Trump Administration” - Senator Lummis Senator Lummis’ #BitcoinAct proposes a strategic national Bitcoin reserve to strengthen U.S. financial stability by leveraging revalued gold reserves and reallocating Fed funds. A bold step towards cementing #Bitcoin’s role in national strategy and financial innovation.
